sense.def:
Izraz
such
uporabljamo, ko govorimo o osebi ali stvari, ki smo jo pravkar omenili ali ki je tej zelo podobna.

seg.quote: They lasted for hundreds of thousands of years. On a human time scale, such a period seems an eternity.
The nobility held tournaments, but peasants had no time to spare for such frivolity.
I don't believe in magic, there is no such thing.
We have been asked to consider alternatives. Many such have been proposed in the last few years.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
such
poudarimo stopnjo ali obseg nečesa.

seg.quote: It was such a lovely day.
It was strange that such elegant creatures made such ugly sounds.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
such as
ali
such...as
uvedemo en ali več primerov nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a game of chance such as roulette.
...such things as pork pies, sausage rolls, and plum cake.

sense.def:
Izraz
such...that
ali
such...as
uporabimo, ko govorimo o tem, kakšen je rezultat ali posledica nečesa.

seg.quote: They have to charge in such a way that they don't make a loss.
She got such a shock that she dropped the milk-can.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
such as it is
pokažemo, da nekaj ni zelo dobro, pomembno ali koristno.

seg.quote: Dinner's on the table, such as it is.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
as such
pokažemo, da govorimo samo o nečem in ne upoštevamo tudi drugih stvari ali vprašanj, povezanih s tistim.

seg.quote: He is not terribly interested in politics as such.

sense.def:
Izraz
such and such
uporabimo, kadar nečesa ne želimo imenovati konkretno.

seg.quote: John always tells me that I have not taken such and such into account.
